name: phpjs
description: php.js offers community built php functions in javascript
author: Kevin van Zonneveld <kevin@vanzonneveld.net>

scripts.build:npm: node lib/cli.js --action buildnpm --output build/npm.js && ls -al build/npm.js
scripts.fix: node lib/cli.js --action cleanup && eslint functions bin lib test tools --fix
scripts.release: git commit CHANGELOG.md -m 'Update CHANGELOG.md' && npm version ${SEMANTIC:-patch} -m "Release %s" && npm run version:replace && git commit test/fixture/*.stdio -m 'Update version' && git push --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run test:utils && npm run test:functions && npm run test:module
scripts.website:deploy: npm run website:inject && cd website && npm run build && npm run deploy
